channel.title: semihosting on Our Embeddeds
channel.description: Recent content in semihosting on Our Embeddeds

item.title: Remote control via semihosting
item.description: In this article, we communicate our embedded cortex-m with the PC during debug session using a trick called semihosting. This trick provides access to host IO (console, filesystem, shell execution) remotely from our embedded device.
